context:
Beads description:
Add a color input for the --primary CSS variable to ThemeControls.svelte.

Currently ThemeControls only has fg-light, fg-dark, bg-light, bg-dark color pickers. Should add --primary so users can customize the accent/primary color used for buttons, links, selection, etc.

File: src/docs/ThemeControls.svelte
Reference: theme_values object needs primary added, then add color input in the cluster section.
